tool_description: This API helps you to translate text from one language to another. It's simple and fast.
name: Google Translator
title: Google Translator

api_list.name: Get Language List
api_list.description:
The "Language List API" provides a flexible and comprehensive endpoint for accessing language information in ISO 639-1 standard. This endpoint offers two different functionalities based on user input, allowing developers to retrieve specific language details or obtain a complete list of ISO languages along with their names.

Endpoint and Parameters:

Endpoint: /language-list
Method: GET
Query Parameter: code (optional) - A valid ISO 639-1 language code representing the language to retrieve. If provided, the endpoint will return the ISO code and the name of the specific language. If not provided, the endpoint will return a list of all ISO languages along with their names.
Functionality:

Specific Language Retrieval:

Description: If the user provides an ISO code in the code query parameter, the endpoint will return the details of the specific language represented by the code.
Endpoint Example: /language-list?code=en
Response: The API will respond with a JSON object containing the ISO code and the English name of the specified language

api_list.name: Detect the Language
api_list.description: This endpoint detect the language of the text.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.default: O que vocês estão fazendo agora aqui meus amigos?

api_list.name: Translate
api_list.description:
This endpoint retrieves the translation for from one language to another.

The API detect the language automatically and translate it to the desired language.

Parameters:

text: The text to be translated. This parameter is required and should contain the text that needs to be converted to the target language.
targetLanguage: The target language for translation. This parameter is also required and specifies the language to which the text should be translated.
Key Features:

Effortless Translation: This API endpoint allows users to effortlessly translate any text provided in the source language to their desired target language. By passing the "text" and "targetLanguage" parameters, users can receive accurate and contextually relevant translations.

Error Handling: The Translation API endpoint is designed with robust error handling mechanisms, ensuring reliable translation results. In cases where the "text" or "targetLanguage" parameters are missing or invalid, the API returns informative error messages, guiding users to successful translations.

Real-Time Translations: Asynchronous processing enables quick responses, providing real-time translations to enhance user experience and interactions across multilingual applications.

Wide Language Support: With support for a wide range of languages, the API caters to global audiences and facilitates seamless communication across diverse language communities.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.default: If you try to start off with a more complex coding language, it can be hard to learn to code. Take the time to learn easier languages like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, or Python before moving on to complex languages like C++.
